summary: Adds variety to the Vigilants of Stendarr by adding NPC's with different combat styles, even genders!
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center]
[size=7][center][color=yellow]May Stendarr have mercy on you...[/color][/center][/size]

[size=5][center][color=orange]Description[/color][/center][/size][line]
[center]Ever wondered why a religious military order only had one type of warrior? This mod intends to fix that!

Varied Vigilants adds different classes of NPC's to the Vigilants of Stendarr, including mages, several types of melee and even genders! For maximum compatibility the only vanilla assets modified were the NPC's leveled lists.

Added Male characters when only Females were in vanilla, added magic, ranged and melee warriors for all races and genders. Now the Vigilants do stand a chance against Daedra!

Completely Lore-Friendly. More details below.[/center]


[size=5][center][color=orange]Requirements[/color][/center][/size][line]
[i][list]
[*]Skyrim.esm
[*]Update.esm
[*]Dawnguard.esm
[/list][/i]


[size=5][center][color=orange]Installation[/color][/center][/size][line]
1. Install the mod using your favorite mod manager (recommended) or just drop the contents of the file in Data folder.
2. Activate the [i]Varied_Vigilants.esp[/i]. You may sort this mod anywhere you like as only vanilla NPC Leveled Lists are altered.
3. Play!

[u][b]Updating Procedures[/b][/u]: Simply replace the esp with the newer version, no worries on updating.

[u][b]Instructions on adding to BOSS Userlist:[/b][/u]

1. Open Boss Userlist Manager.
2. Select [i]Varied_Vigilants.esp[/i] in the lower-left pane.
3. Click the "AFTER" selection box and select "BOTTOM".
4. In the adjacent text box type [i]Base V[/i].
5. In the text box below type [i]TAG: {{BASH:Relev}}[/i] and click [Save Rule].
6. Close Boss Userlist Manager and click [Yes] when prompted to save. This allows BOSS to properly sort the new file.


[size=5][center][color=orange]Uninstallation[/color][/center][/size][line]
1. Save your game.
2. Deactivate [i]Varied_Vigilants.esp[/i] and delete all mod files.
3. Reload the save game and pray it isn't completely destroyed!


[size=5][center][color=orange]Compatibility[/color][/center][/size][line]
Should be compatible with [b][i]everything[/i][/b] else as I changed no vanilla assets! (apart from leveled lists obviously) For complete compatibility create a bashed patch so as not to lose any leveled list changes.


[size=5][center][color=orange]Mod Notes[/color][/center][/size][line]
What this mod does is increase the stock of "basic" NPC's that the game uses when it wants to spawn a new vigilant by almost sixteenfold. Furthermore, it makes sure that the stock of vigilants actually contain some female NPC's (along with other things described below).

New NPC types added:
- Male Dark Elf (there were only females in vanilla)
- Male Redguard (there were only females in vanilla)
- Male and Female Imperials
- Melee Two-Handed Class
- Melee One-Handed and Shield Class
- Melee Dual Wielding Class
- Mage Class
- Ranged Class
- Added progression all the way to level 50!

All the races have one of each of the classes. Over 550 NPC's added (against the 35 in vanilla).


[color=yellow][center][size=3][b]Type Breakdown[/b][/size][/center][/color]
[heading]Mage[/heading]
Outfit and Inventory changes:
[list]
[*]20% chance of having a leveled staff
[*]Reworked leveled books - included rarer books, fit for scholars
[*]Reworked unused vanilla outfit
[/list]
SpellList changes:
[list]
[*]Spells hand-picked for each level template - specializing in fire and restoration magic!
[*]Perks hand-picked for each level template
[/list]
Misc changes:
[list]
[*]Custom combat style
[*]Custom class
[/list]
[heading]Ranged[/heading]
Outfit and Inventory changes:
[list]
[*]Reworked vanilla outfit
[*]Uses crossbows as weapons
[*]Includes dagger for close range combat
[/list]
SpellList changes:
[list]
[*]Removed spells that did not fit - removed warding and armour spells
[/list]
Misc changes:
[list]
[*]Custom class
[*]Custom combat style
[/list]
[heading]Melee One-Handed and Shield[/heading]
Outfit and Inventory changes:
[list]
[*]Custom outfit with custom shield leveled list
[*]Uses custom mace leveled list as weapons
[/list]
SpellList changes:
[list]
[*]Removed spells that did not fit - removed warding spell
[/list]
Misc changes:
[list]
[*]Custom combat style
[/list]
[heading]Melee Two-Handed[/heading]
Outfit and Inventory changes:
[list]
[*]Reworked vanilla outfit
[*]Uses custom warhammer leveled list as weapons
[/list]
SpellList changes:
[list]
[*]Removed spells that did not fit - removed warding spell
[/list]
Misc changes:
[list]
[*]Unused Vigilant2H class
[/list]
[heading]Melee Dual Wielding[/heading]
Outfit and Inventory changes:
[list]
[*]Reworked vanilla outfit
[*]Uses custom mace leveled list as both weapons
[/list]
Misc changes:
[list]
[*]Custom Combat Style
[*]Custom Class
[/list]


[size=5][center][color=orange]To Do[/color][/center][/size][line]
Even more variety:
[list]
[*]More races, more genders (wait, what?), more armours, weapons, classes, you name it!
[/list]

All feedback is appreciated! Suggestions and requests are also welcome, specially if it includes new weapons and armours.



[size=7][center][color=yellow]...for the Vigil has none to spare![/color][/center][/size]
author: Gandaganza
